Methods in realtimeweb.businesssearch.json with parameters of type BusinessQuery
 void JsonBusinessSearch.searchBusinesses(BusinessQuery query, JsonBusinessSearchListener listener)
          Queries the Yelp service for businesses that match the given BusinessQuery.

 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.filterCategories(BusinessCategory... categories)
          Filters the results by categories, returning only results that fall into the given categories.

          Filters the results by categories given by their alias (e.g.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.filterDeals()
          Filter the results to only include businesses that offer a deal.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.filterDeals(boolean requireDeal)
          If requireDeal is true, only return businesses that offer a deal.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.filterTerm(String term)
          Sets the search term (e.g.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.limitRadius(int radius)
          Limit the radius of this query.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.limitResults(int limit)
          Limit the number of results returned to limit.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.offsetResults(int offset)
          Offset the list of returned business results by offset.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.paginate(int offset, int limit)
          "Paginate" the results, that is return a certain number at a certain point.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeCategoriesFilter()
          Remove any categories that are being filtered.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeCategoriesFilter(BusinessCategory... categories)
          Remove a list of categories from the filter.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeCategoriesFilter(String... categories)
          Remove a list of categories from the filter, given as alias strings.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeDealsFilter()
          Remove the current deals filter, returning all businesses even if they don't offer a deal.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removePagination()
          Remove any "pagination".
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeRadiusLimit()
          Removes the radius limit filter, so results will be returned regardless of their distance from the location.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeResultLimit()
          Allow any number of results to be returned.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeResultOffset()
          Remove any offset of the results, so results will be returned starting with the first.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeSortBy()
          Remove the sorting option, so that results are sorted by the default (SortMode.BEST_MATCHED).
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.removeTermFilter()
          Removes the term filter, so any results can be returned.
 BusinessQuery BusinessQuery.sortBy(SortMode sortMode)
          Change the way that results are sorted.
